alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 8:01PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clinton County through 845 PM CDT... At 801 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Charlotte, or 11 miles southeast of Maquoketa, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charlotte, Welton and Goose Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
